known_for.title: Ka/Pae. Ranasingam
known_for.overview: Ariyanchi is married to Ranasigam, who works in Dubai, and the couple has a little daughter. On the day of their daughter's ear piercing ceremony, a shocking news reaches the family.

results.title: Virumandikum Sivanandikum
results.overview: A jobless youngster and his friend borrow money from a goon to start a business and fall into a trap of a filmmaker in disguise. A few unexpected incidents turn their life topsy-turvy.

known_for.title: Vanangaan
known_for.overview: The story is about one who bows down only to love but rises against injustices inflicted on those around him.

results.title: Virumaandi
results.overview: Angela, a civil advocate interviewing inmates at the Madras Central Prison for a documentary on the death penalty meets Virumaandi and Kothaala, who are sentenced to death and life respectively for their roles in perpetrating the massacre of 24 people during a brutal clash between feuding villages. As tensions mount within the prison walls, she listens to their conflicting accounts of the same story.
